text: Basi ikiwa Mayahudi hawa na makafiri wengineo watakukanusha, ewe Mtume, hakika wabatilifu wamewakanusha Mitume wengi kabla yako waliowajia kaumu zao kwa miujiza mingi yenye kushinda, hoja zilizo wazi, vitabu vya mbinguni ambavyo ni nuru inayoondosha giza na Kitabu chenye ufafanuzi, kilicho wazi
